description: Refers to photos, music, or content on the internet that provide vitality or healing when you are feeling down or emotional. Ibuprofen is a drug used to reduce fever, inflammation, and pain.

examples.chinese: 太勾了,不愧是电子布洛芬～看到他浑身都不疼了
examples.translation: So attractive, indeed electronic ibuprofen ~ seeing him makes all my pain go away.

examples.chinese: 百听不厌,我的电子布洛芬一听所有烦恼都忘掉了
examples.translation: Never get tired of listening, my electronic ibuprofen makes me forget all my troubles.

examples.chinese: 新vlog更新,你是我的电子布洛芬,速更速更
examples.translation: New vlog update, you are my electronic ibuprofen, update faster.
